text: Gwaebeop Renecite Station () is a station of the BGLRT Line of Busan Metro in Gwaebeop-dong, Sasang District, Busan, South Korea. The subname in parentheses of BGL is Gangbyeon Park where the Samrak Riverside Sports Park is nearby.
